problem.markdown:
>>All of the following are soil-forming factors EXCEPT _________.<< () climate (x) nutrients () organisms () topography () time () parent material
[explanation] The five soil forming factors are climate, organisms, topography, time and parent material. Nutrients are not a soil forming factor. [explanation]
problem.p: All of the following are soil-forming factors EXCEPT _________.

choicegroup.label: All of the following are soil-forming factors EXCEPT _________.

div.p: The five soil forming factors are climate, organisms, topography, time and parent material. Nutrients are not a soil forming factor.
